Title: Sense8
Writer: J. Michael Straczynski, Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
Actors: Doona Bae, Jamie Clayton, Tina Desai, Tuppence Middleton
Plot: A group of people around the world are suddenly linked mentally, and must find a way to survive being hunted by those who see them as a threat to the world's order.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 2 wins & 8 nominations.
